column4: how do I share a folder?  I am trying to move files off of a computer that's got knoppix running over to my ubuntu machine
hrrm you need tesetup a folder as shared in the menus....
it may install samba (i suggest thins method -- 'samba' to do windows shars)
and I have been able to see the folder on the knoppix computer
you will also need to 'smbpasswd -a <user>' as approriate to add a  samba password for taht user on the ubunt machine (I think)
but I was unable to write to it.
I did that too.  I think
then you can use the knoppix machine to connect too the SMB share on the ubuntu machine and copy across
which i am not entirely sure howto do under knoppix grapihically...
ok how would I do it through the terminal?
I have done smbclient etc. but that is another matter.. ask in knoppix channel?
well do yuo need to copy a whole load of files/dirs ? or just files in one dir ?
I need a bunch of files that are in different dirs
some things I need some I don't
hrrrrrm well you would be best to ask somebody who is familiar with KNOPPIX grapical kde file tools
erm... if you are familira with commands to do things you can tar up the files you need and send the tar file wtih smbclient
